hints: This 1954 case overturned the 'separate but equal' doctrine
It dealt with racial segregation in public schools
This 1973 case established a woman's right to have an abortion
It was overturned in 2022 by Dobbs v. Jackson Women's Health Organization
The plaintiff used the pseudonym 'Jane Roe'
This 1966 case established the Miranda rights
It requires police to inform suspects of their rights before questioning
The phrase 'You have the right to remain silent' stems from this case
This 1803 case established the principle of judicial review
It was decided under Chief Justice John Marshall
It involved a dispute over undelivered judicial commissions
This 2015 case legalized same-sex marriage nationwide
It was a consolidation of six lower-court cases
The lead plaintiff was James Obergefell
